snippet: Lawrence Elliot, 50, received 13 years to life for attacking a City College student in 2010 in the Hamilton Heights section of Manhattan.
abstract: City College student who was the victim of rape in 2010 speaks out at formal sentencing of her attacker, Lawrence Elliot, convicted of predatory sexual assault; Elliot receives 13 years to life for attack, which took place in victim's Hamilton Heights off-campus apartment.
lead_paragraph: Lawrence Elliot, 50, received 13 years to life for attacking a City College student in 2010 in the Hamilton Heights section of Manhattan.

headline.main: At Sentencing, Victim Describes Rape and Its Aftermath
headline.print_headline: At Sentencing In Rape Case, Victim Tells Of Her Pain
